<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0+"
    pfs=""
>
[Lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=29)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 290 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A lantern sheds bright light and requires 1 pint of oil to function for 6 hours.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 0"
pfs="Standard"
>
Lantern (Bull's-Eye)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 290 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Bulk** 1

</row>

</column>

---

A bull’s-eye lantern emits its light in a 60-foot cone (and dim light in the next 60 feet).

<title
level="2"
right="Item 0"
pfs="Standard"
>
Lantern (Hooded)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 290 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 7 sp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

A hooded lantern sheds light in a 30-foot radius (and dim light in the next 30 feet) and is equipped with shutters, which you can close to block the light. Closing or opening the shutters takes an Interact action.
name: Lantern
